title: Student engagement with, and participation in, an e-forum
authors: RB Mason - Journal of educational technology & society
excerpt: ABSTRACT This paper examines engagement with an online discussion forum, aiming to identify the different levels of participation and to investigate factors that encourage or discourage student participation. The case involved the posing of a short real-life problem  ...
